member.name: ICredentialProviderEvents.CredentialsChanged
member.summary: Signals the Logon UI or Credential UI that the enumerated list of credentials has changed. This happens when the number of credentials change, the individual credentials change, or the number of fields available change. This is an asynchronous method.
member.param: A pointer to an integer that uniquely identifies which credential provider has requested re-enumeration. The credential provider should pass back the interface pointer it received from in this parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderEvents
member.summary: Provides an asynchronous callback mechanism used by a credential provider to notify it of changes in the list of credentials or their fields.
